column5: Can anyone tell me if the ice is breaking up or off of Lake Muskoka yet? my folks used to live in Gravenhurst and we used to bet when it would be off. I used to say April 17 every year, but thinking it might be early this year?
from other reports I've read, I would say it's done...might take a bit to break up, but doesn't sound like it's worth walking on..unless you have a canoe and a float suit
